pageContext.claim: “Very disappointed with General Motors and their CEO, Mary Barra, for closing plants in Ohio, Michigan and Maryland. Nothing being closed in Mexico & China. The U.S. saved General Motors, and this is the THANKS we get! We are now looking at cutting all @GM subsidies, including or electric cars. General Motors made a big China bet years ago when they built plants there (and in Mexico) - don't think that bet is going to pay off. I am here to protect America’s Workers!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is likely referring to a federal tax cut for customers who buy fully electric cars, but revoking or changing that rule isn't something that he could do unilaterally.
